name: UpdateEnvironmentBatchExports
description:
Update environment batch exports details.

Use this tool to update the details of environment batch exports for a specific project. It is helpful when modifications are needed in the batch export configurations of environments.

parameters.name: batch_export_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID identifying the specific batch export to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this batch export.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to access; retrieve from /api/projects/ if needed.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: batch_export_update_data
parameters.description: JSON data to update the batch export. Includes ID, team details, model, destination configurations, intervals, and more.

name.description: A human-readable name for this BatchExport.

model.description:
Which model this BatchExport is exporting.

* `events` - Events
* `persons` - Persons
* `sessions` - Sessions

type.description:
A choice of supported BatchExportDestination types.

* `S3` - S3
* `Snowflake` - Snowflake
* `Postgres` - Postgres
* `Redshift` - Redshift
* `BigQuery` - Bigquery
* `Databricks` - Databricks
* `HTTP` - Http
* `NoOp` - Noop

config.description: A JSON field to store all configuration parameters required to access a BatchExportDestination.

interval.description:
* `hour` - hour
* `day` - day
* `week` - week
* `every 5 minutes` - every 5 minutes

paused.description: Whether this BatchExport is paused or not.

created_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExport was created.

last_updated_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExport was last updated.

last_paused_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExport was last paused.

start_at.description: Time before which any Batch Export runs won't be triggered.

end_at.description: Time after which any Batch Export runs won't be triggered.

status.description:
The status of this run.

* `Cancelled` - Cancelled
* `Completed` - Completed
* `ContinuedAsNew` - Continued As New
* `Failed` - Failed
* `FailedRetryable` - Failed Retryable
* `FailedBilling` - Failed Billing
* `Terminated` - Terminated
* `TimedOut` - Timedout
* `Running` - Running
* `Starting` - Starting

records_completed.description: The number of records that have been exported.

latest_error.description: The latest error that occurred during this run.

data_interval_start.description: The start of the data interval.

data_interval_end.description: The end of the data interval.

cursor.description: An opaque cursor that may be used to resume.

created_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun was created.

finished_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun finished, successfully or not.

last_updated_at.description: The timestamp at which this BatchExportRun was last updated.

records_total_count.description: The total count of records that should be exported in this BatchExportRun.

bytes_exported.description: The number of bytes that have been exported in this BatchExportRun.

batch_export.description: The BatchExport this run belongs to.

backfill.description: The backfill this run belongs to.

schema.description: A schema of custom fields to select when exporting data.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
